name: Lena the Leopard
description:
Lena the Leopard is a fast-paced endless runner that you can take with you on the go! Play as Lena and traverse the desert in an attempt to defeat the evil sun creature. Move side to side, jump, and duck to avoid oncoming obstacles and pick up snowballs along the way to throw at the evil sun!

My Role

I was mainly a programmer on this project, responsible for part of the UI functionality, boss functionality, and asset implementation. I also worked on sound effects, and making UI art. My focus was on writing modular scripts to keep the project’s code light and reusable. In addition to programming I was the organizer on the project. Scheduling, facilitating meetings, and running check-ins were my responsibility.

Team Members: Zoë Pilgrim, Maxwell Mutch, Ashley Reddick, and Tyson Baker.
